A peace-offering an earnest and passionate intreaty, for peace, unity, & obedience ... Stileman, John, d. 1685.
[16], 348 p.
Printed for Thomas Pierrepont, London : 1662.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to John Stileman. cf. NUC pre-1956. Hebrew at head of title. Errata: p. [1] at end.
